title: Fernando Jurado-Lasso
text:
Research Interests
        Research focused on the intersection of embedded systems and machine learning, particularly reinforcement learning for IoT applications and cyber-physical systems.

title: Fernando Jurado-Lasso
text:
About Me
    
    
    I am an experienced engineer specializing in IoT, Networked Embedded Systems, and Machine Learning for communications and networking. I currently work as a postdoctoral researcher at DTU Compute, Technical University of Denmark. I hold a Ph.D.Â in Engineering from The University of Melbourne, focused on Software-Defined Wireless Sensor Networks (SDWSNs), an M.Eng. in Telecommunications Engineering, and a B.Eng. in Electronics Engineering from Universidad del Valle, Colombia.
    
    I am passionate about addressing challenges in IoT ecosystems, particularly in resource management, network optimization, and intelligent runtime adaptation. My research interests revolve around the intersection of IoT, embedded systems, and ML. I also have extensive experience teaching, mentoring, and supervising student research projects.
